entry.title: 90"x132" Premium Dark Blue Faux Denim Polyester Rectangular Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 25.99 - 295.99 (2 variants)

[About]


Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
Material: Polyester
Size: 90 x 132 Inches
Seamless, 1 pc design
Edges: Finish Edges
Gives floor length hang on standard 2.5 ft (30") x 6 ft (72") table
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


    [Information]

    Faux Denim Tablecloth

    Swooning over trendy denim jeans and jackets? Wait till you explore our dashing denim linen collection! Our faux denim tablecloths are fun, durable, and so easy to clean- just like your favorite pair of jeans. With the rustic, yet refined look of these faux denim linens your tabletops will have a unique, fresh appeal.

    Made from Heavy Duty Polyester

    Crafted from 100% heavy duty polyester and elegantly finished with orange sewn seams, our tablecloths are perfect for casual as well as upscale gatherings. Featuring soft smooth texture, these linens are pleasing to both sense of sight and touch.

    		   
     

    Multi-Use

    Pair these with our burlap, gingham or polyester overlays and runners for western/country themed events, casual cookouts, or showcase glitz and glam of your celebration by teaming these denims with our sparkling sequin line and crystal line.


    Additional Information:

     

    • How to Care: Tablecloths are machine washable. Use warm water wash, low temp dry.
    • For Tablecloth only, decorations not included
    • Uses:  Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

      Linen Care Instructions
      Size Chart
